___location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

___name.description: The name of the MAK key.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___isEligible.description: true if user has eligible on-premises Windows physical or virtual machines, and that the requested key will only be used in their organization; false otherwise.

___osType.description: Type of OS for which the key is requested.

___agreementNumber.description: Agreement number under which the key is requested.

___installedServerNumber.description: Number of activations/servers using the MAK key.
